title: Painting
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel M. Kootz
provenance_text:
Georges Mathieu [1921-2012], Paris, France; Samuel M. Kootz Gallery, New York, NY, until November 1958 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 288, illustrated in the catalogue, plate 6) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by Samuel M. Kootz Gallery.
[2]. The painting was a gift of Mr. and Mrs. Samuel M. Kootz, New York, NY. It was accessioned on November 21, 1958.
